frontmatter.title: Key Terms Cloud-Native Software Delivery: A Fact Sheet
frontmatter.description: Modern software is moving fast. While the associated lexicon is continuously changing, there are a number of core concepts and key terms that one must be familiar with in order to effectively drive digital transformation in their organization

frontmatter.title: DevOps 101
frontmatter.description: DevOps, DevSecOps, et al are some of the most commonly misunderstood terms in the industry. While their usage has become ubiquitous over the past 6 years or so, their meaning frequently gets lost and implementation suffers...
